description:
Madoka seems down after Chihiro cleans his room, and Chihiro looks to his past to figure out why. Also, Miyako continues to practice cooking to impress Keiichiro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On ne fait bien que ce qu`on aime
Suki Koso Mono no Jouzu Nare
What One Likes, One Will Do Well
好きこそ物の上手なれ
